fields.name: ConfigMode
fields.description: Name of configuration mode to use. Modes are pre-defined configurations of security controls, extension allowlists and guest configuration, maintained by Microsoft.

fields.name: ExtensionsAllowList
fields.description: Array of extensions that are allowed to be installed or updated.

fields.name: ExtensionsBlockList
fields.description: Array of extensions that are blocked (cannot be installed or updated)

fields.name: ExtensionsEnabled
fields.description: Specifies whether the extension service is enabled or disabled.

fields.name: GuestConfigurationEnabled
fields.description: Specified whether the guest configuration service is enabled or disabled.

fields.name: IncomingConnectionsPorts
fields.description: Specifies the list of ports that the agent will be able to listen on.

fields.name: ProxyBypass
fields.description: List of service names which should not use the specified proxy server.

fields.name: ProxyUrl
fields.description: Specifies the URL of the proxy to be used.
